title: And they named it Holland
creator_credit: Carillon Films and Gerard J. Raucamp
brief_description: Provides aerial views of Holland, without commentary. Illustrates the variety of environment contrasting old and new, urban and rural, highlighting the diversity of life in a small and densely populated country.
description: Provides aerial views of Holland, without commentary. Illustrates the variety of environment contrasting old and new, urban and rural, highlighting the diversity of life in a small and densely populated country.
